title: New Zealand v England: third men’s cricket one-day international – live
summary: In Wellington, the third ODI between New Zealand and England is underway, with live updates provided by our writers. Stay tuned for over-by-over commentary and analysis as the match progresses. Fans can follow the action closely as the teams compete for victory.

title: Gumnuts, baby! How two abseiling horticulturalists rescued specimens from an endangered tree
summary: The threatened Jillaga Ash tree (Eucalyptus stenostoma) was discovered at a depth of 90 meters down a cliff in Wadbilliga National Park, southern New South Wales. This sighting highlights the tree's rare habitat. Conservation efforts may be necessary to protect this endangered species.

title: World Series Game 6: Los Angeles Dodgers 3-1 Toronto Blue Jays – as it happened
summary: The Los Angeles Dodgers triumphed over the Toronto Blue Jays with a score of 3-1, resulting in a decisive Game 7. This playoff victory has set the stage for an exciting final matchup in Toronto on Saturday. Fans, including David Lengel, eagerly anticipate the showdown.

title: LA Dodgers hold on in Toronto to force winner-take-all Game 7 in World Series
summary: The Dodgers avoided elimination in Game 6 of the World Series by defeating the Blue Jays 3-1. Yoshinobu Yamamoto delivered another strong performance, contributing to the team's success. The win forces a decisive Game 7 in the championship series.

title: History secured: There is no telling where the record-breaking Roos’ AFLW dominance will end I Nino Bucci
summary: North Melbourne has achieved a historic feat by winning 24 consecutive games, more than any other team in VFL/AFL/AFLW history. The team is now focusing on the goal of securing back-to-back premierships. This remarkable streak highlights their dominance in the league.
